block.p: Selena Robin Crabbe, a daughter of Patricia and Robert Crabbe of New Bedford, Mass., was married last evening to David Schwamm Snow, a son of Judith Snow of Darien, Conn., and Robert Snow of Mattituck, N.Y. The Rev. Dr. George Koury, a minister of the Church of Divine Science, officiated at the home of the bridegroom's mother.
Mrs. Snow, 27, is an actress who has appeared in regional and Off Off Broadway productions. She is also a cabaret singer who performs as Pink Snow. She graduated from Sarah Lawrence College.

Selena Robin Crabbe, a daughter of Patricia and Robert Crabbe of New Bedford, Mass., was married last evening to David Schwamm Snow, a son of Judith Snow of Darien, Conn., and Robert Snow of Mattituck, N.Y. The Rev. Dr. George Koury, a minister of the Church of Divine Science, officiated at the home of the bridegroom's mother.
Mrs. Snow, 27, is an actress who has appeared in regional and Off Off Broadway productions. She is also a cabaret singer who performs as Pink Snow. She graduated from Sarah Lawrence College.
Mr. Snow, 42, is a technology consultant in New York. He graduated from Rice University, from which he also received an M.B.A. degree.
